column5: Spanning 180 feet and 30 feet high, Mantle Rock is an impressive natural sandstone bridge owned by the Nature Conservancy in Livingston County Kentucky.\nMantle Rock is also part of the Trail of Tears National Historic Trail, memorializing the harsh winter of  1838-39.
column6: An enormous natural sandstone bridge in Kentucky.
column7: ['Cave-In-Rock', 'Garden of the Gods', 'Ben E. Clement Mineral Museum']
